name: US Army Training - Ellite Commando Camp
name_original: US Army Training - Ellite Commando Camp
description:
The best army training game is now available on IOS platforms. Experience the third person game and get the ultimate commando boot camp training. The courses have thrilling and exciting challanges where you have to climb walls, run, crawl and jump the obstacles that will challenge your skills and strength.

This game has the most realistic third person 3D graphics and addictive gameplay levels and will give you the ultimate army training expereince that cover the most challenging courses involve in navy seals, commandos and marine schools.

The courses have different training ground and environments on deserts, dense forest, hiking, mountains, snow with challenging situations where you have to survive by using the extreme combat and assault tools and techniques. Your reputation and skills will be tested to the limit to be able to successfully complete all obstacles and challenges to become the top army commando in US army.

Download the amazing and exciting free army commando training simulation game for free
